com.radirius.merc.geo

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.radirius.merc.geo.Shape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ellipse, Point, Rectangle, Triangle

    public abstract class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
    The abstraction of all shapes.
    Author:
    wessles

      • translateTo

               float y,
               float origx,
               float origy)
        Moves all vertices to x and y relative to a origin.
        Parameters:
        x - Where every vertex should move relative to the origin on x.
        y - Where every vertex should move relative to the origin on y.
        origx - The origin's x.
        origy - The origin's y.

        Rotate the object relative to a origin.
        Parameters:
        origx - The origin's x.
        origy - The origin's y.
        angle - The angle by which the object will rotate relative to the origin.
